answers.answer: There are other reasons you could be measuring big. I'm a little overweight so I measured a little big, too. Sometimes you can measure big if you're bloated, have gestational diabetes or placenta previa, also if you have an excessive amount of amniotic fluid or if this isn't your first pregnancy. If your due date is off, your doctor can help you with that. I'm getting another ultrasound at 28 weeks to see if my due date is off.
ohh ok then thank you that was alot of help this is my first child so everything is new too  me there are so many questions needed to be asked
I'm 26 weeks and I'm measuring a week ahead. My doctor said my baby girl is just growing more rapidly.

It changes i measured 4 weeks ahead throughout most of my pregnancy got to 34 weeks and measured correct when I was measured last week at 36weeks I measured just over 37 weeks lol. So confusing but yeah it can balance itself out eventually so don't worry to much
I'm 32. 3 measuring at 34.3 .....but my baby is big!  already over 5lbs.
Thank everyone for responding. (: I'm glad I'm not alone lol

question: anyone else was or is measuring big?? i am 34 weeks and the doctor said im measuring 36 weeks what can this mean? can it mean he might be here sooner then i thought? i need advice and help
title: measuring bigg?
